excerpt.rendered:
MODEL NUMBER : hC-204

DESCRIPTION : Mono Top Tension Mesh back Wig with 1” NPU perimeter at ear to ear over front, adjustable straps at nape area. We also make Stretch Mesh back Mono Top Wig. We can make any color, design, and shape. Please visit our Custom Wig Order Form for other specifications.
